sentences.english: The exaggerated bosom ornament, big black feathers joss-stick shoulder white dew.
sentences.chinese: 胸前点缀夸张的黑色羽毛，大露雪白香肩。

sentences.english: I do not like to boast of my own child, but to be sure, Jane -- one does not often see any body better looking.
sentences.chinese: 我并不喜欢夸张自己的孩子，可是说老实话。

sentences.english: I'm exaggerating but I do so to make a point.
sentences.chinese: 这是夸张的讲法，但我这么说有其用意。

sentences.english: It is no exaggeration to say that this is the atomic age.
sentences.chinese: 说现在是原子时代并不夸张。

sentences.english: Our elders exaggerate about love in college. They say love is a waste of time and money.
sentences.chinese: 我们长辈们总是过于夸张大学校园里的爱情。

sentences.english: Big small, is an exaggerative and the most hypostatic thing.
sentences.chinese: 可大可小，就是夸张的最本质的东西。

sentences.english: Those whom sports writers most despise, they first overrate.
sentences.chinese: 对那些最鄙视的人，足球记者总是先开始夸张。

sentences.english: The breastbone bold, without being unduly prominent.
sentences.chinese: 胸骨明显，但没有夸张的突出。

sentences.english: You’re right. I exaggerate, but not that much.
sentences.chinese: 你说对了，我是夸张了，但并不过分。

sentences.english: It is no exaggeration to say many people are obsessed with horoscopes.
sentences.chinese: 如果说有一大堆人对星座著迷，可是一点也不夸张。

sentences.english: Taking advantage of abstract line, brilliant color and high-sounding intersperse reveals luxurious feature.
sentences.chinese: 抽象的线条，大胆的颜色和夸张的点缀尽显致奢华。

sentences.english: An exaggeration is a blood relation to falsehood and nearly as blamable.
sentences.chinese: 夸张是谎言的血亲，应同样受到责备。

sentences.english: Please don't exaggerate. It can't be that good.
sentences.chinese: 别夸张了，根本就没你说得那么好。

sentences.english: At the same time, context refrains the deviation of hyperbole.
sentences.chinese: 同时，语境制约着夸张中的偏离。

sentences.english: The most hilarious errors came from garbage records.
sentences.chinese: 最夸张的错误来自于垃圾数据。

sentences.english: Throw in some exaggeration, and try to be random and unpredictable.
sentences.chinese: 加入一些夸张的成分，尝试变得随机和不可预知一些。
